DomainData.MainInfoText: We use cookies to store or retrieve information on your browser. This information may relate to you, your preferences, or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change your settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
DomainData.AlertNoticeText: By clicking ”OK”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, and analyze site usage.Privacy Statement
DomainData.CookieListDescription: A cookie is a small piece of data (text file) that a website – when visited by a user – asks your browser to store on your device in order to remember information about you, such as your language preference or login information. Cookies set by us are called first-party cookies. We also use third-party cookies – which are cookies from a domain different than the domain of the website you are visiting – for other functions, including advertising and marketing efforts. More specifically, we use cookies and other tracking technologies for the following purposes:

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Groups.GroupDescriptionOTT: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __cf_bm
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Cloudflare cookie necessary to detect and prevent malicious bot activity. This cookie expires after 30 minutes of continuous inactivity by the end user. The cookie contains information related to the calculation of Cloudflare’s proprietary bot score and, when Anomaly Detection is enabled on Bot Management, a session identifier. The information in the cookie (other than time-related information) is encrypted and can only be decrypted by Cloudflare. A separate __cf_bm cookie is generated for each site that an end user visits, as Cloudflare does not track users from site to site or from session to session. The __cf_bm cookie is generated independently by Cloudflare and does not correspond to any user ID or other identifiers in a customer’s web application.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __cfruid
FirstPartyCookies.description: Cookie associated with sites using CloudFlare, used to identify trusted web traffic.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __ssid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to protect against account fraud.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __udmy_1_a12z_c24t

FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie that represents a unique client and is used for the basic delivery of the site, including for anti-fraud services.

FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie for backend functions that represents a unique client.

FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is required for correct functioning of the checkout service.

FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is associated with the Django web development platform for Python. It is designed to help protect a site against at particular type of software attack on web forms.

FirstPartyCookies.description: Temporary cookie used to test for cookie support. Expires instantly.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: dj_session_id
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is the Django Monolith session tracking cookie for strictly necessary site functionality.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: EUCookieMessageShown
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie helps manage user cookie consent preference for compliance purposes.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: EUCookieMessageState
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie helps manage user cookie consent preference for compliance purposes.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: eventing_session_id
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie holds session ID for Udemy eventing system. This cookie ensures that the correct version of the site appears for the user.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: evi
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie ensures that the correct version of the site appears for the user.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: exaff
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is required for the payment system to have correct attribution.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: existing_user
FirstPartyCookies.description: user

FirstPartyCookies.Name: hlsJsStartLevel
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is a JavaScript library cookie that implements an HTTP Live Streaming client and determines the correct display resolution

FirstPartyCookies.Name: inaff

FirstPartyCookies.Name: mute
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to manage audio settings for an HTTP Live Streaming client.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: new_user
FirstPartyCookies.description: user

FirstPartyCookies.Name: OptanonAlertBoxClosed
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is set by websites using certain versions of the cookie law compliance solution from OneTrust.  It is set after visitors have seen a cookie information notice and in some cases only when they actively close the notice down.  It enables the website not to show the message more than once to a user.  The cookie has a one year lifespan and contains no personal information.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: OptanonConsent
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is set by the cookie compliance solution from OneTrust. It stores information about the categories of cookies the site uses and whether visitors have given or withdrawn consent for the use of each category. This enables site owners to prevent cookies in each category from being set in the users browser, when consent is not given. The cookie has a normal lifespan of one year, so that returning visitors to the site will have their preferences remembered. It contains no information that can identify the site visitor.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: pxcts
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used in conjunction with PerimeterX for site security purposes.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: seen
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a first-party Udemy cookie set on response headers to any render request to our server and is used for basic site functionality.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_brand
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to designate dimensions of the client to determine which version of a cached response (e.g. based on device or based on language) should be served. Without this cookie, an incorrect version of the site may be displayed.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_campaign_code
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie used to determine and store the campaign code of a visitor so that the site displays correctly.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_device
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie used to determine and store the type of device a visitor is on so that the site displays correctly.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_language
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie relevant to the language of the site that is necessary for the basic delivery of the site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_logged_in
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie that stores a boolean value for whether a user is logged in.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_marketplace_country
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie that stores the country code based on a visitor's IP address so that the correct version of the site displays.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_modern_browser
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie that determines whether the user is on a recent or legacy browser so that the site displays and functions correctly.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_price_country
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie that stores the country code based on a visitor's IP address so that the correct version of the site displays.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_release
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie that stores the version of the site codebase for error handling and troubleshooting.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_user
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie that stores the visitor's user ID.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_cache_version
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a Udemy first-party cookie that stores the version of the site cached on the users' browser to ensure that the most recent version of the site is displayed.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_credit_last_seen
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is required to show a user an accurate reflection of the user's credits.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_credit_unseen
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is required to show a user an accurate reflection of the user's credits.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_locale
FirstPartyCookies.description: Cookie that stores a users locale

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_rule_vars
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie assists in the dynamic caching function to deliver content.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ud_user_jwt
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is required for authentication and site security.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: udmy_branded_partner
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie ensures that the correct sign up homepage appears.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ufb_acc
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie facilitates user logins.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: volume
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to store the user's video volume level.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: intercom-session-sehj53dd
FirstPartyCookies.description: Identifier for each unique browser session. The user can access their conversations and have data communicated on logged out pages for 1 week, as long as the session isn't intentionally terminated with `Intercom('shutdown');`, which usually happens on logout.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: last_searched_phrase
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie facilitates populating the search bar with previously searched phrases.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: muxData
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used in context with a video-player, so that if the visitor is interrupted while viewing video content, the cookie remembers where to start the video when the visitor reloads the video.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: new_user
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used for determining the correct version of certain pages to display.

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies allow us to count visits and measure activity so we can improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how users move around the site. If you do not allow these cookies, we will not be able to monitor its performance.

They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how users move around the site. If you do not allow these cookies, we will not be able to monitor its performance.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __udmy_evid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie holds variant assignments.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _dd_s
FirstPartyCookies.description: Cookie used to group all events generated from a unique user session across multiple pages. It contains the current session ID, whether the session is excluded due to sampling, and the expiration date of the session. The cookie is extended for an extra 15 minutes every time the user interacts with the website, up to the maximum user session duration (4 hours).

FirstPartyCookies.Name: eva
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie helps measure site usage.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: fs_uid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie helps measure site and feature utilization.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: optimizelyEndUserId

FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie helps to retrieve information about sessions.

The cookie is extended for an extra 15 minutes every time the user interacts with the website, up to the maximum user session duration (4 hours).

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies are set by social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store personally identifiable information but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
